git reset --hard.url: Blocked: 'git reset --hard' discards all uncommitted changes. Use 'git stash' to save changes first, or 'git reset --soft' to keep changes staged.

git reset --merge.url: Blocked: 'git reset --merge' can discard uncommitted changes. Use 'git stash' to save changes first, then reset.

git checkout --.url: Blocked: 'git checkout -- <file>' discards unstaged changes permanently. Use 'git stash' to save changes first.

git restore --worktree.url: Blocked: 'git restore --worktree' discards working tree changes permanently. Use 'git stash' to save changes first.

rm -fri.url: Blocked: 'rm -fri' involves recursive forced removal. Verify the target path carefully or use 'trash' instead.

shred.url: Blocked: 'shred' overwrites file contents making recovery impossible. This is an irreversible operation.

rmdir.url: Blocked: 'rmdir' removes directories. Verify the target directory is correct before proceeding.

chmod.url: Blocked: 'chmod' changes file permissions which can affect security. Review the permission changes carefully.

chown.url: Blocked: 'chown' changes file ownership which can affect access control. Review the ownership changes carefully.

git clean -f.url: Blocked: 'git clean -f' permanently deletes untracked files. Use 'git clean -n' for a dry run first.

git clean -fd.url: Blocked: 'git clean -fd' permanently deletes untracked files and directories. Use 'git clean -nd' for a dry run first.

git clean -fx.url: Blocked: 'git clean -fx' permanently deletes untracked and ignored files. Use 'git clean -nx' for a dry run first.

git clean -xf.url: Blocked: 'git clean -xf' permanently deletes untracked and ignored files. Use 'git clean -nx' for a dry run first.

git clean -xfd.url: Blocked: 'git clean -xfd' permanently deletes untracked files, directories, and ignored files. Use 'git clean -nxd' for a dry run first.

git clean -fxd.url: Blocked: 'git clean -fxd' permanently deletes untracked files, directories, and ignored files. Use 'git clean -nxd' for a dry run first.

git clean -dfx.url: Blocked: 'git clean -dfx' permanently deletes untracked files, directories, and ignored files. Use 'git clean -ndx' for a dry run first.

git push --force.url: Blocked: 'git push --force' overwrites remote history and can destroy collaborators' work. Use 'git push --force-with-lease' for a safer alternative.

git push -f.url: Blocked: 'git push -f' overwrites remote history and can destroy collaborators' work. Use 'git push --force-with-lease' for a safer alternative.

git branch -d.url: Blocked: 'git branch -d/-D' deletes branches which may contain unmerged work. Verify the branch has been merged or backed up first.

git stash drop.url: Blocked: 'git stash drop' permanently deletes a stash entry. Verify you no longer need the stashed changes.

git stash clear.url: Blocked: 'git stash clear' permanently deletes ALL stash entries. Verify you no longer need any stashed changes.

git commit --no-verify.url: Blocked: 'git commit --no-verify' skips pre-commit hooks that enforce code quality. Fix hook issues instead of bypassing them.

git push --no-verify.url: Blocked: 'git push --no-verify' skips pre-push hooks that enforce quality checks. Fix hook issues instead of bypassing them.

dd if=/dev/urandom.url: Blocked: 'dd if=/dev/urandom' writes random data to a device or file, which can destroy data or entire disks irreversibly.

mkfs.url: Blocked: 'mkfs' creates a new filesystem, destroying all existing data on the target device.

fdisk.url: Blocked: 'fdisk' modifies disk partition tables, which can cause catastrophic data loss.

truncate.url: Blocked: 'truncate' changes file size, potentially destroying file contents. Verify the operation is intended.
